database

Class Standards

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Standards

  • public class Standards
extends java.lang.Object
    Standards ensure that no single table/field/element in the database have an unacceptable value such as a single whitespace. Such standards have to be strictly followed in order to avoid any inconveniences and dysfunction of the database.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Theodosis Tsaklanos, Anna Maria Mersinoglou
